greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = a(n-1)+a(n-3)+a(n-4).
comment: a(2n) = F(2n+1) = A001519(n). a(n+2) - a(n+1) - a(n) gives match to A000034, apart from signs.
formula: a(2n+1) = (-1)^(n+1) + A001906(n+1) (compare with a similar property for A116697) - _Creighton Dement_, Mar 31 2006
results.author: _Creighton Dement_, Feb 23 2006
